tool_description: Your free API for video creation and editing
name: JSON2Video
title: JSON2Video

api_list.name: Get the status of your movie renders
api_list.description: Get a list of your movie renders, in what step of the rendering process they are and a link to the resulting video once they finish.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json2video.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json2video.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create a new movie
api_list.description: Create a new movie passing your JSON script
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json2video.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json2video.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://json2video.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json2video.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
